other_tests.findings: 1-cm pedunculated polyp 18 cm from the rectum, two smaller polyps, no active bleeding.
other_tests.changes_over_time: Polyps were removed at intervals over the years; most were juvenile or hamartomatous.

other_tests.findings: Multiple telangiectatic lesions in the nasal mucosa, hard and soft palates, gingivae, and tongue.
other_tests.changes_over_time: Embollization of several distal branches of the bilateral internal maxillary arteries.

other_tests.findings: Innumerable arteriovenous malformations in the liver.
Multiple bilateral pulmonary arteriovenous malformations, 2 to 4 cm in diameter.
Filling defects in the antrum of the stomach and along the greater curvature.
Duodenal polyp measuring approximately 2.1 cm with diffuse dysplasia.
other_tests.changes_over_time: Polyps evolved to more proliferative dysplastic phenotypes confirmed by biopsies.

other_tests.findings: Successful embolization of the largest arteriovenous malformations.
other_tests.changes_over_time: Surveillance endoscopy showed no polyps or telangiectasia in the colon, distal ileum, or stomach.

other_tests.findings: Multiple duodenal polyps with dysplasia and intramucosal carcinoma, but no invasive carcinoma.
